description: Begin, Ze'ev Binyamin -- Photographs; Begin, Menachem, 1913-1992 -- Photographs
label: Former Prime Minister Menachem Begin, has hardly been seen in public over the past seven years, Begin, now 76 years old, lives the life of a virtual recluse in his Jerusalem home, He is never interviewed by the media or photographed except at what has become an annual pilgrimage to the grave of his wife, Aliza, on the anniversary of her death, which occur seven years ago today.
